AND ( #userId# in ( select AU.person_id from IKEP4_BD_ITEM_READER rdr INNER JOIN IKEP4_AD_ADDRGROUP AG ON rdr.reader_id=AG.addrgroup_id INNER JOIN IKEP4_AD_PERSON2GROUP AU ON AG.addrgroup_id =AU.addrgroup_id where item.item_id=rdr.board_item_id and rdr.reader_type='C'
